title: Naam Vaazhndhidum Lyrics Vai Raja Vai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Vai Raja Vai Naam Vaazhndhidum Song Lyrics
Singer: HipHop Tamizha, Yuvan
Lyrics: Madhan Karky

I was his number one fan
when I was a kid
now we making songs with them
that sucks.

I never thought
I would make songs with legends
but i'm making this track and
I'm rapping with Yuvan

I'm a demon in a human form
Hiphop Tamizha
YEAh
I'm back from heaven
you can call me paramasivan
Mavanae enkitta
nee vachchikittana
naanthaan unakku eman
I'm a demon in a human form
Hiphop Tamizha
Yuvan, lets go

Naam vazhndhidum
indha vazhkai mudindhidum
irundhaalum vazhvom.
nam pugal adhu nirandharam

ho ho naam vazhndhidum
indha vazhvil bayam varum
adhai vendru paarthida
naam padaipom sarithiram

vettriyo thozhviyo
veeranaai vazhndhidu
un kaigalai uyarthi nee
andha vinnai vetti
mannil idu.

Karuvarai mudhal
kallarai varai
thaevei sillarai

Sillarai indri
indha vaazhkai
inikkaadha sakkarai.
ikkaraikku
akkara pachcha.
Machi en thiramaikku
munnaal nee pichcha pichcha

en mela kayya vachcha
nee seththa.
modhaadha en kitta
Vaa coz am a
Tamil naattu Gangster
Back in ma sondhaa ooru
coming monster

vai raja vai
naanga kai vachchaalae
geththuthaan .
vai raja vai
engala pagachikittaa
unakku death-uda (2)

Obama illa Osama
nee yaaavenaa
irundhuttu po maama.
aanaa enkitta prachchana venaama
naan mosamaana thamizhan, aama

Naan thala dhaan
nee tharuthala dhaan.
enna pagachchaa
vizhum koladaa
naan malai da
nee veurm yeladaa
enna pudikka illa valadaaa.
ahh ha haa..

Naam vazhndhidum
indha vazhkai mudindhidum
irundhaalum vazhvom.
nam pugal adhu nirandharam

ho ho naam vazhndhidum
indha vazhvil bayam varum
adhai vendru paarthida
naam padaipom sarithiram

vettriyo thozhviyo
veeranaai vazhndhidu
un kaigalai uyarthi nee
andha vinnai vetti
mannil idu.

Pinvaiththa kaalai
munvaiththu paarthaal
edhirikkum thannaale
verkkumada.

Singanthin koondil
sinam kondu siriththaal
singamum annaarndhu
paarkkumadaa

vai raja vai
naanga kai vachchaalae
geththuthaan .
vai raja vai
engala pagachikittaa
unakku death-uda (2)

I'm back from heaven
you can call me paramasivan
Mavanae enkitta
nee vachchikittana
naanthaan unakku yeman (2)

I go back in
the name of hiphop tamizha
with my big bro yuvan
big of the world
we rule it
yeah its that.
